title: Iravaaga Nee Lyrics Idu Enna Maayam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Iravaaga Nee Song Lyrics Idu Enna Maayam
Singer(s): G.V. Prakash Kumar & Saindhavi

Karai nee penne
unai theendum azhayaai naanae.
nuraiyaagi nenjam thudikka.
ondrodu ondraai kalakka
en uyire
kadhoram kadhal uraikka.
oh oru paarvai vendum irakka
en uyire
maru paarvai podhum pirakka.

Vizhi thottadhaa
viral thottadhaa
en aanmai theendi penmai
poo pooththadhaa

Anal suttadhaa
kulir vittadhaa
adadaa en naanam
indru vidai pettradhaa.

Nee naan mattum
vazhkindra ulagam podhum.
UN thozh saayum idam podhumey.

UN peyar solli
silirkkindra inbam podhum
irandhaalum meendum pirapen.

ondrodu ondraai kalakka
en uyire
kadhoram kadhal uraikka.

Mazhai enbadhaa
veyil enbahdaa
pennae un peranbanai naan
puyal enbadhaa.

Adiyae pennae
ariyaadha pillai naanae.
Thaai pol ennai
nee thaanga vaa.

Madimel anbae
pon oonjal naanum seidhaan
thaalaatta unnai azhaippaen.

ondrodu ondraai kalakka
en uyire
kadhoram kadhal uraikka.
